title: Bayer CropScience 's revenue 2005 to 2018
summary: In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.
Revenues in million euros is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, and finally slightly increasing from 2009 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Revenues in million euros, about 9494.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Revenues in million euros, of value 6382.0 was reported at Year 2008
